tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ad_targeting (
    user_id INT,
    behavior_data VARCHAR(255),
    ad_category VARCHAR(50),
    ad_id INT,
    ad_clicks INT
);

CREATE TABLE ad_data(
  ad_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  ad_name VARCHAR(50),
  ad_type VARCHAR(20),
  ad_category VARCHAR(30),
  ad_cost DECIMAL(10,2),
  ad_clicks INT
)

CREATE TABLE ad_targeting (
    targeting_id INT NOT NULL,
    campaign_id INT NOT NULL,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    behavior_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    targeting_score FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE user_profile (
  user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name TEXT,
  age INT,
  gender TEXT,
  location TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ad_campaign (
  campaign_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  budget DECIMAL
);
CREATE TABLE users ( user_id INT, username VARCHAR(255), email VARCHAR(255), age INT, gender VARCHAR(10) );
CREATE TABLE user_behavior ( behavior_id INT, user_id INT, page_visited VARCHAR(255), click_count INT, interaction_time TIMESTAMP );
CREATE TABLE user_preferences ( preference_id INT, user_id INT, category VARCHAR(50), subcategory VARCHAR(50) );
CREATE TABLE user_location ( location_id INT, user_id INT, country VARCHAR(50), city VARCHAR(50), timezone VARCHAR(50) );
CREATE TABLE ads_targeting ( ad_id INT, category VARCHAR(50), subcategory VARCHAR(50), target_gender VARCHAR(10), target_age_lower INT, target_age_upper INT );
